title: Italy reports 41,500 coronavirus cases on Thursday, 185 deaths
description:
Italy reported 41,500 COVID-19 related cases on Thursday, against 36,429 the day before, the health ministry said, while the number of deaths fell to 185 from 214.
The total number of intensive care patients fell to 654 from a previous 681. Some 431,312 tests for COVID-19 were carried out in the past day, compared with a previous 415,288, the health ministry said.

title: Aranhas asiáticas estão a colonizar costa leste dos EUA
description: Aranhas pretas e amarelas de grandes dimensões, originárias da Ásia, têm-se vindo a espalhar nos últimos anos na costa leste dos Estados Unidos, mas as autoridades garantem que são inofensivas e podem até ajudar o ecossistema local.
